law.catch_line: In this section, "jurisdiction" means a county, sanitary district, or municipal corporation....

text.section: In this section, "jurisdiction" means a county, sanitary district, or municipal corporation.
This section does not affect §§ 35-138, 35-140, 35-141, and 35-145 of the Code of Public Local Laws of Baltimore County.

The Commission shall set only the rates for water that one jurisdiction supplies within another jurisdiction:
on written application by the jurisdiction that receives the water; and
in the same way as rates are set for water companies.
